about_the_game:
Once, the evil creatures residing in the dungeons constantly invaded the cat clan's homeland, seizing treasures and resources. To defend their territory and reclaim lost wealth, the brave cat warriors decide to delve into the dungeons, defeat these enemies, and restore their glory.

Tetris Cat and the Dungeon combines the gameplay of Slay the Spire with the classic Tetris mechanics. Here, you will damage enemies and trigger various effects by clearing Tetris blocks. After defeating all the enemies in a room, you can choose one of three new blocks to add to your collection, gradually increasing your combat power.

Features

    Collect and upgrade powerful blocks: Gain and enhance your blocks by defeating monsters and bosses, creating unbeatable combinations.Unique combat mechanics: Use Tetris block clearing to deal damage to enemies and trigger special effects.Randomly generated dungeons: Experience new maps, enemies, and surprises in every adventure.Rich events and shops: Encounter various events and shops during your journey to acquire new blocks and resources.
  • Strategic building: Combine and arrange blocks cleverly to create powerful strategies to defeat enemies and complete the game.

Embark on this adventure, build your powerful block combinations, defeat all enemies in the dungeon, and reclaim the cat clan’s glory and wealth!
